name: Unreal Texture Package
summary: Learn about .UTX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Unreal Engine games reference textures in UTX files to apply detailed images to 3D models, making characters, objects, and arenas look more realistic. Most gamers will not encounter UTX files unless they are attempting to modify elements within a game. For example, they may edit textures in a UTX file to create new looks for characters or redesign environments.

instructions: UTX files are not meant to be opened since the games packaged with them automatically reference them. However, you can open them with various tools to view and modify the textures they store. Options include Epic Games UnrealEd, Dragon UnPACKer, and Unreal Tournament Package Tool.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
